parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The next_page_token value returned from a previous List request, if any.

name.description: Resource name of the book. It must have the format of "shelves/*/books/*".

parent.description: The parent resource name where the book is to be created.

book_id.description: The book id to use for this book.

book.description:
The book resource to create.
The field name should match the Noun in the method name.

name.title:
The resource name of the book to be deleted, for example:
"shelves/shelf1/books/book2"

The field will contain name of the resource requested, for example:
"shelves/shelf1/books/book2"

parent.description: The parent resource name, for example, "shelves/shelf1".

page_size.description: The maximum number of items to return.

page_token.description: The next_page_token value returned from a previous List request, if any.

books.description:
The field name should match the noun "books" in the method name. There
will be a maximum number of items returned based on the page_size field
in the request.

next_page_token.description:
Token to retrieve the next page of results, or empty if there are no
more results in the list.

book.description: The book resource which replaces the resource on the server.

update_mask.description: The update mask applies to the resource.

protobufEmpty.title:
A generic empty message that you can re-use to avoid defining duplicated
empty messages in your APIs. A typical example is to use it as the request
or the response type of an API method. For instance:

paths.description: The set of field mask paths.
